question:
Match the column A (type of crystalline solid) with the column B (example for each type):

| Column A | Column B |
|---|---|
| P. Molecular Solid | i. SiC |
| Q. Ionic Solid | ii. Mg |
| R. Metallic Solid | iii. <katex>$H_2O$</katex> |
| S. Network Solid | iv. MgO |
choices: P-ii, Q-iv, R - iii, S - i
P-iii, Q- iv, R - ii, S - i
P- iii, Q-i, R - ii, S - iv
P-iv, Q-iii, R - ii, S - i
explanation: Correct match: P-iii, Q-iv, R-ii, S-i.
